definitions.definition: The state or quality of being black in colour.
examples: The blackness of outer space comes from the lack of anything to reflect light rather than the absence of light.

definitions.definition: Any space that such colour pervades.
examples: Out of the blackness came some flickers of light.

definitions.definition: The quality of being evil or dismal .
The state of being of African descent.
The experiences and culture of African-American people.

main_definition: The state or quality of being black in colour.
secondary_definitions: Any space that such colour pervades.
( figurative ) The quality of being evil or dismal .
The state of being of African descent.
The experiences and culture of African-American people.
